name: jPek quest
description:
-----About-----

jPek quest is a short game where you help return Pek's jApple. After picking a monster you must fight your way trough a few randomly ordered levels and defeat the boss.

If you want to try all monsters and their evolutions you have to play a couple of games.

-----Controls-----

Keyboard

  • esc - Open settings
  • E - Attack 1
  • D - Attack 2

Mouse 

  • Select buttons with your cursor

-----Nonsense you can skip-----

This game is a passion project that was supposed to take way less time than it did, but it's finally done!

I decided to make the visuals mixed-media so I can do some claymation and pixelart which made the game a bit more unique.

The game was build using Game Maker Studio 2 which is kind of why it's only available on Windows due to some game maker subscription shenanigans.

I didn't have a musician so i had to make my own music and it turned out kind of good.
